name: NobleWorks
overview:
Welcome to NobleWorks Inc cards, where retail and wholesale card publishing and selling funny birthday cards is the main business. Here, unusual dirty humor and irony are practically a religion, in fact, hilarious, humorous and funny birthday poems often make it into our prayers.

We have no doubt you will agree that every one of our unique humorous funny cards is hilarious! Heck, everyone enjoys a Nice and Funny Christmas card or a funny birthday card, don’t they? And not only we offer free shipping even when you buy a single $2.95 naughty Christmas or funny Birthday card, but our dirty cards are sick, our humor cards are sarcastic and our naughty cards are sometimes mean or bad.

Check out our hilarious funny birthday card which are the funniest and craziest humor cards you’ll find anywhere, online or in greeting card stores, and that’s for one reason and one reason only: â€˜cause we’re crazy, sick and twisted! Yeah, we said it. We are naughty, just like our greeting cards humor and we love it!
